metadata.title: Waypoint by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Waypoint provides a modern workflow for build, deploy, and release across platforms.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.

integrationsConfig.description: A curated collection of official, partner, and community Waypoint Integrations.

integration.name: AWS ECR
integration.description: The AWS ECR plugin pushes a Docker image to an Elastic Container Registry on AWS.

flags.name: Built-in
flags.description: This integration is shipped in the core product and does not need to be installed.

activeRelease.readme:
The AWS ECR plugin pushes a Docker image to an [Elastic Container Registry](https://aws.amazon.com/ecr/getting-started/)
on AWS.

### Components

1. [Registry](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-ecr/latest/components/registry/aws-ecr-registry)

### Related Plugins

1. [AWS ECR Pull](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-ecr-pull)
2. [AWS ECS](/waypoint/integrations/hashicorp/aws-ecs)

components.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Store a docker image within an Elastic Container Registry on AWS.

### Interface

- Input: **docker.Image**
- Output: **ecr.Image**

### Examples

```hcl
registry {
    use "aws-ecr" {
      region = "us-east-1"
      tag = "latest"
    }
}
```

### Mappers

#### Allow an ECR Image to be used as a standard docker.Image

- Input: **ecr.Image**
- Output: **docker.Image**
components.name: AWS ECR Registry

variables.description:
the AWS region the ECR repository is in
if not set uses the environment variable AWS_REGION or AWS_REGION_DEFAULT

the ECR repository to store the image into
This defaults to waypoint- then the application name. The repository will be automatically created if needed
the docker tag to assign to the new image

component.readme:
<!-- This file was generated via `make gen/integrations-hcl` -->
Store a docker image within an Elastic Container Registry on AWS.

### Interface

- Input: **docker.Image**
- Output: **ecr.Image**

### Examples

```hcl
registry {
    use "aws-ecr" {
      region = "us-east-1"
      tag = "latest"
    }
}
```

### Mappers

#### Allow an ECR Image to be used as a standard docker.Image

- Input: **ecr.Image**
- Output: **docker.Image**
component.name: AWS ECR Registry

variables.description:
the AWS region the ECR repository is in
if not set uses the environment variable AWS_REGION or AWS_REGION_DEFAULT

the ECR repository to store the image into
This defaults to waypoint- then the application name. The repository will be automatically created if needed
the docker tag to assign to the new image
